verses.text: \w Having|strong="G2192"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w promises|strong="G1860"\w*, dearly \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w*, let us \w cleanse|strong="G2511"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w filthiness|strong="G3436"\w* of the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w perfecting|strong="G2005"\w* \w holiness|strong="G0042"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Receive|strong="G5562"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*; we have \w wronged|strong="G0091"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w*, we have \w corrupted|strong="G5351"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w*, we have \w defrauded|strong="G4122"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w*.

I \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \add this\add* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w condemn|strong="G2633"\w* \add you\add*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* I have said \w before|strong="G4280"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* ye \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w die|strong="G4880"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* live \w with|strong="G4800"\w* \add you\add*.

\w Great|strong="G4183"\w* \add is\add* \w my|strong="G3427"\w* boldness of \w speech|strong="G3954"\w* \w toward|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \add is\add* \w my|strong="G3427"\w* \w glorying|strong="G2746"\w* \w of|strong="G5228"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*: I am \w filled|strong="G4137"\w* with \w comfort|strong="G3874"\w*, I am \w exceeding|strong="G5248"\w* \w joyful|strong="G5479"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w tribulation|strong="G2347"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w*, \w when|strong="G2532"\w* we were \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w*, \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w rest|strong="G0425"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w we|strong="G2257"\w* were \w troubled|strong="G2346"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* every \w side|strong="G3956"\w*; \w without|strong="G1855"\w* \add were\add* \w fightings|strong="G3163"\w*, \w within|strong="G2081"\w* \add were\add* \w fears|strong="G5401"\w*.

\w Nevertheless|strong="G0235"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, that \w comforteth|strong="G3870"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* that are cast \w down|strong="G5011"\w*, \w comforted|strong="G3870"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w coming|strong="G3952"\w* of \w Titus|strong="G5103"\w*;

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w coming|strong="G3952"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w by|strong="G2532"\w* the \w consolation|strong="G3874"\w* \w wherewith|strong="G3739"\w* he was \w comforted|strong="G3870"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, when he \w told|strong="G0312"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* earnest \w desire|strong="G1972"\w*, \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w mourning|strong="G3602"\w*, \w your|strong="G5216"\w* fervent \w mind|strong="G2205"\w* \w toward|strong="G5228"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w*; so \w that|strong="G5620"\w* \w I|strong="G3165"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="G5463"\w* the \w more|strong="G3123"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* though I \w made|strong="G3076"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* sorry \w with|strong="G1722"\w* a \w letter|strong="G1992"\w*, I \w do|strong="G3338"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w repent|strong="G3338"\w*, \w though|strong="G1487"\w* I did \w repent|strong="G3338"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* I \w perceive|strong="G0991"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w same|strong="G1565"\w* \w epistle|strong="G1992"\w* hath \w made|strong="G3076"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w sorry|strong="G3076"\w*, \w though|strong="G1487"\w* \add it were\add* \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G4314"\w* a \w season|strong="G5610"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G3568"\w* I \w rejoice|strong="G5463"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* ye were made \w sorry|strong="G3076"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* ye \w sorrowed|strong="G3076"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w repentance|strong="G3341"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* ye were made \w sorry|strong="G3076"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* a godly \w manner|strong="G2316"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye might receive \w damage|strong="G2210"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w godly|strong="G2316"\w* \w sorrow|strong="G3077"\w* \w worketh|strong="G2716"\w* \w repentance|strong="G3341"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w* not to be repented \w of|strong="G0278"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* the \w sorrow|strong="G3077"\w* of the \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w worketh|strong="G2716"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w behold|strong="G2400"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* selfsame \w thing|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G3076"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* \w sorrowed|strong="G3076"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* a godly \w sort|strong="G2316"\w*, \w what|strong="G4214"\w* \w carefulness|strong="G4710"\w* it \w wrought|strong="G2716"\w* in \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w yea|strong="G0235"\w*, \add what\add* clearing of \w yourselves|strong="G0627"\w*, \w yea|strong="G0235"\w*, \add what\add* \w indignation|strong="G0024"\w*, \w yea|strong="G0235"\w*, \add what\add* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w*, \w yea|strong="G0235"\w*, \add what\add* vehement \w desire|strong="G1972"\w*, \w yea|strong="G0235"\w*, \add what\add* \w zeal|strong="G2205"\w*, \w yea|strong="G0235"\w*, \add what\add* \w revenge|strong="G1557"\w*! \w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add things\add* ye have \w approved|strong="G4921"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w clear|strong="G0053"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* this \w matter|strong="G4229"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G0686"\w*, \w though|strong="G1752"\w* I \w wrote|strong="G1125"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \add I did it\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* for his \w cause|strong="G1752"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* had done the \w wrong|strong="G0091"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3761"\w* for his \w cause|strong="G1752"\w* that suffered \w wrong|strong="G0091"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* that \w our|strong="G5216"\w* \w care|strong="G4710"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w you|strong="G2257"\w* in the \w sight|strong="G1799"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* might \w appear|strong="G5319"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G1223"\w* we were \w comforted|strong="G3870"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w comfort|strong="G3874"\w*: yea, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w exceedingly|strong="G4056"\w* the \w more|strong="G3123"\w* joyed \w we|strong="G5463"\w* \w for|strong="G1909"\w* the \w joy|strong="G5479"\w* of \w Titus|strong="G5103"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* was \w refreshed|strong="G0373"\w* \w by|strong="G0575"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* I have \w boasted|strong="G2744"\w* any \w thing|strong="G5100"\w* to \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w of|strong="G5228"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, I \w am|strong="G2617"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w ashamed|strong="G2617"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* we \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* to \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w boasting|strong="G2746"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \add I made\add* \w before|strong="G1909"\w* \w Titus|strong="G5103"\w*, is \w found|strong="G1096"\w* a \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* inward \w affection|strong="G4698"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* more \w abundant|strong="G4056"\w* \w toward|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, whilst he \w remembereth|strong="G0363"\w* the \w obedience|strong="G5218"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w how|strong="G5613"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w trembling|strong="G5156"\w* ye \w received|strong="G1209"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

I \w rejoice|strong="G5463"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3754"\w* \w that|strong="G1722"\w* I have \w confidence|strong="G1722"\w* \w in|strong="G3956"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w in|strong="G5213"\w* \w all|strong="G2292"\w* \add things.\add*
